message.en_US: I guess I should use this time and make it worthwhile.
Oh, I guess I missed some messages today!
\c[2]Oh look. Another email…
\c[2]Uh… creepy phishing scam monsieur, I am not that thick to fall for anything, let’s see the rest for fun!
\c[2]What the hell!
\c[2]Non mais… What kind of freaking joke is this!?
\c[2]I swear I’m going to punch whoever thought this was funny!
\c[2]Am I going nuts? Is the game reaching out to me since I left it?
\c[2]If this is the First Scholars or Sergey trying to lure me back in, I’ll send them straight to the fiery pits de l’enfer!
\c[2]But what if it’s something serious…?
\c[2]Would it be that bad to just see what this is about?
\c[2]I have some spare time, I guess I could just fulfill my curiosity…
Am I really doing this…?
I guess I have to make sure… Hopefully it’s not too bad…
Another nightmare...\. This can't keep happening...
message.zh_CN: Another nightmare...\. This can't keep happening...
message.de_DE: Another nightmare...\. This can't keep happening...
message.ko_KR: 또 악몽이야...\. 계속 이럴 순 없는데...
message.ja_JP: Another nightmare...\. This can't keep happening...

message.en_US: Lea, tu me manques...
How can I move on when I am haunted so often...
message.zh_CN: How can I move on when I am haunted so often...
message.de_DE: How can I move on when I am haunted so often...
message.ko_KR: 이렇게 자주 생각나면 난 어떻게 살라고...
message.ja_JP: How can I move on when I am haunted so often...

message.en_US: I can't help to miss you chérie.
message.zh_CN: I can't help to miss you chérie.
message.de_DE: I can't help to miss you chérie.
message.ja_JP: I can't help to miss you chérie.

message.en_US: It's almost time to get up anyways... no way I'll get anymore sleep.
message.zh_CN: It's almost time to get up anyways... no way I'll get anymore sleep.
message.de_DE: It's almost time to get up anyways... no way I'll get anymore sleep.
message.ko_KR: 그나저나 곧 일어날 시간이잖아... 더 잘 수는 없겠네.
message.ja_JP: It's almost time to get up anyways... no way I'll get anymore sleep.

message.en_US: I oughta go freshen up with a shower before Nadine gets up and uses all the hot water again.
message.zh_CN: I oughta go freshen up with a shower before Nadine gets up and uses all the hot water again.
message.de_DE: I oughta go freshen up with a shower before Nadine gets up and uses all the hot water again.
message.ko_KR: 나딘이 일어나서 온수 다 써버리기 전에 샤워를 좀 해야겠어.
message.ja_JP: I oughta go freshen up with a shower before Nadine gets up and uses all the hot water again.

message.en_US: Alright Émilie, une nouvelle journée!
I should really take a shower and clean up before I dress up.
message.zh_CN: I should really take a shower and clean up before I dress up.
message.de_DE: I should really take a shower and clean up before I dress up.
message.ja_JP: I should really take a shower and clean up before I dress up.

message.en_US: I wonder how the team project will go today...\. I hope my part will be good enough.
message.zh_CN: I wonder how the team project will go today...\. I hope my part will be good enough.
message.de_DE: I wonder how the team project will go today...\. I hope my part will be good enough.
message.ko_KR: 오늘 조별과제는 어떻게 되려나...\. 내 분야가 적당히 좋길 바라야겠지.
message.ja_JP: I wonder how the team project will go today...\. I hope my part will be good enough.

message.en_US: Uh? A message in the middle of the night?
message.zh_CN: Uh? A message in the middle of the night?
message.de_DE: Uh? A message in the middle of the night?
message.ja_JP: Uh? A message in the middle of the night?

message.en_US: \c[3]"Is this the famed Emilienator?"\c[0]
I don’t recognise the number... Did Lukas get a new phone?
message.zh_CN: I don’t recognise the number... Did Lukas get a new phone?
message.de_DE: I don’t recognise the number... Did Lukas get a new phone?
message.ko_KR: 번호를 모르겠네... 루카스가 새 휴대폰을 샀나?
message.ja_JP: I don’t recognise the number... Did Lukas get a new phone?

message.en_US: There's no other message on my phone.
message.zh_CN: There's no other message on my phone.
message.de_DE: There's no other message on my phone.
message.ja_JP: There's no other message on my phone.

message.en_US: Even if I have the time for it, I’m not really in the mood to use the computer after this nightmare...
message.zh_CN: Even if I have the time for it, I’m not really in the mood to use the computer after this nightmare...
message.de_DE: Even if I have the time for it, I’m not really in the mood to use the computer after this nightmare...
message.ko_KR: 할 시간이 있긴 해도, 그 악몽 때문에 컴퓨터 할 기분은 전혀 안 나는걸...
message.ja_JP: Even if I have the time for it, I’m not really in the mood to use the computer after this nightmare...

message.en_US: Logging in...
